Using Topic Filters

Filtering allows you to limit the topics that appear in the upper pane.  The application includes default filters, but if desired you can customize filters and create new ones. See Creating a Filter.

To control the data shown on the upper pane, select a filter from the Filter drop-down list box on the toolbar.

The default topic filters include:

<I Am Recipient>

Identifies all the topics that name you as a recipient.

By Creator

Groups the topics by their original authors.

Show Active

Identifies all topics and responses that have Active status.

Show All

Identifies all topics (default).
